Hi, my name is Juan Torres-Munguía. I am a Mexican PhD student in Applied Statistics and Empirical Methods at the George-August-Universität Göttingen. 

My research interests are the use of flexible semi-parametric regression methods to analyze data on economic development with geo-spatial information.
